name.description: The display name for the vessel

flag_state.description: The vessels flag state and country to report ERS messages to. Should be a 3 letter ISO code.

cfr.description: The vessel's Community Fleet Registration number. Fixed format defined by the pattern: "AAAXXXXXXXXX" (AAA = Fully capitalised country code of the vessel's first registration within the EU, XXXXXXXXX = 9 character alphanumeric code.). Known as CFR or IR

call_sign.description: The vessels international radio call sign (RC)

hull_number.description: The vessel's side (hull) registration number. Also known as XR or PLN. May contain dots or dashes

gbr_rss.description: GBR ONLY: The vessel's unique identity number as recorded by the UK Registrar of Seamen and Shipping

iccat.description: International Commission for the Conservation of Atlantic Tuna identifier

gfcm.description: Global Fisheries Council of the Mediterranean identifier

uvi.description: Unique Vessel Identifier (IMO number). A number issued by the tuna RFMOs or by ISSF.

imo_code.description: The unique identification of a vessel according to Lloyds register

net_tonnage.description: The net loading capacity of the vessel, expressed in tons

gross_tonnage.description: The gross loading capacity of the vessel, expressed in tons

registration_date.description: The date the vessel was registered

full_length.description: The full length of the vessel in meters
